name: Grimoire Arena
description:
Grimoire Arena is an FPS TCG where you collect spells to put into decks, and bring those decks into first person multiplayer arena combat!  Shoot fire and ice at your opponents, charge into battle with great strength and weaponry, or summon allies to fight for you! With the available play styles constantly growing, come and make your own wizard experience!

█▄ Grimoire Arena is currently in Alpha, expect bugs. In fact, PLEASE let me know on the discord about any bugs you encounter! If i don't know about a bug, i can't fix it! ▄█

█▄ In order to host a game properly, make sure you have forwarded port 7777 ▄█
